mapper.insert: insert into ahzit_reply(reply_no, reply_writer_no, reply_origin_no, reply_content) values(#{replyNo}, #{replyWriterNo}, #{replyOriginNo}, #{replyContent})
mapper.update: update ahzit_reply set reply_content = #{replyContent} where reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ahzit_reply where reply_origin_no = #{replyOriginNo}
